resources.string: You are a badass, a skyscrapper is built by placing one brick a day - Victor Gomes

Customization: When first starting the app, you should use the "customize" button in the home page to customize the morning habits that you would like to keep track of. There you're given the options to remove and add new things to your list, which will be retained the next time you open the app.

Home Page: For everyday use, you will be able to check off the things you have accomplished that day in the home page, take a photo to be attached to that day and then press the "complete" button when done.

Complete Page: Upon pressing complete, you will receive a fun or motivating quote and your day will be recorded in the statistics. The complete page will also show a preview of your statistics so far and give you the ability to share it.

Stats Page: Going back to the home page, there is a "stats" button that will bring you to the stats page, which allows you to review your stats graph and share it at any time. In the stats page you can also review any of the days you have recorded using the calendar spinner and pressing the "see day" button.

Day Page: The day page will show you the picture you took for that day if any and all the things you checked off.
HINT: Remove an item by clicking on it.
